name: RX_RXW_CONT_RECV_PHRM
description: This table contains information about the pharmacies that will be receiving the container with which it is associated.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the work request record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PHARMACY_ID
columns.description: The pharmacy that has or will be receiving this container.
